correction.p: OCR generated transcript has not been corrected.

normalization.p: Only minor normalization where needed, if any, is indicated via markup.

punctuation.p: All punctuation marks in the source text have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.
Punctuation may be marked up with pc elements for clarification, but not exclusively.

quotation.p: All quotation marks have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.

hyphenation.p: Hyphenated words that appear at the end of a line have been retained. The hyphen, if present, is represented by the Unicode code point, and marked up with a pc element. The break="no" attribute on the lb element indicates that a single word is split across the lines.

interpretation.p: Dates, places, and names may be marked up, where useful.

Bear Sir:
My son is working on some genealogical research
on his faaiily and I'-aai writing to you to see if you can
furnish some inforaiation to us.
My faiuily lived at o99 East 19th Street and I
attended your cnurch during the years 1939 (the year ol
aiy birth) until sometiixie during the mid 1990's. My
naxae before my xnarriage was Linda Marilyn Eisosway.
I would ajjjjreciate it if you could forward
any inibraxation you might have on record, such as names,
addresses and any relevant dates concerning, either me or
my family. My fathei ' s naub was Hariy Plandi-eau Eisosway
and aiy mother's name was Estelle (Stella) Eisosway.
Thank you for any helj,. you can give to us.
Sincerely,
Linda E. Ra
